history.narrative: Law 1-103 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 1-139, which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary and Criminal Law. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on September 15, 1976, and October 12, 1976, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 9, 1976, it was assigned Act No. 1-172 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
